alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 7:32PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Crawford, northwestern Sebastian, southeastern Sequoyah and northeastern Le Flore Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 732 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Spiro, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Sallisaw... Pocola... Muldrow... Roland... Spiro... Arkoma... Panama... Hackett... Bonanza... Gans... Cameron... Moffett... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Shady Point... Rock Island... Cowlington... Scullyville... Braden... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 5. Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 311 and 328. Interstate 540 between mile markers 4 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
